full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: Black Gym Shoes**

**Reference Number:** 21-120-238180
**Publication Date:** February 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** May 31, 2023, 2:00 PM ET

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Category:** Goods
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:** Various (See page 2)

**Description:**
Correctional Service Canada requires the supply of Black Gym Shoes for inmates. The goods shall conform to the Purchase Description CAG-2-2301-762G and drawings. The firm quantity for this requirement is 20880 pairs.

**Delivery:**
Deliverables will be made to Laval, Quebec, with a maximum delivery time of May 2024.
**Option to Order Additional Quantities:**
Additionally, the contractor may be required to supply an aggregate quantity of up to 104,000 pairs over the contract term of 60 months.

**Selection Criteria:**
The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price as the primary criterion.

**Contracting Entity:**
The contracting authority for this project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services Procurement (PSPC) – Correctional Services Canada.

**Contact Information:**
For any questions or concerns, please contact Darya Kritova from PSPC, at [darya.kritova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:darya.kritova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Document URL:**
Please visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15485666?extsite=MTU0ODU2NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15485666?extsite=MTU0ODU2NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for more information.

*   **Regions of Opportunity:** None
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Laval, Quebec
